remarks: The functionalization of the involution component of a structure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Oct-2015.)
statement:
staffval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
staffval.i $e |- .* = ( *r ` R ) $.
staffval.f $e |- .xb = ( *rf ` R ) $.
staffval $p |- .xb = ( x e. B |-> ( .* ` x ) ) $.
$d .* x $.
$d B x $.
$d R x $.
